## DELETE\_EVENT\_MUTATION variable

This mutation is used to delete the event frpm the organization. After validating the user and the organization, the mutation deketes the event and update events in the user record.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
DELETE_EVENT_MUTATION: import("graphql").DocumentNode
```

## Remarks

This mutation is declared in talawa-API. Documentation for this mutation can find [here](https://github.com/PalisadoesFoundation/talawa-api/blob/develop/lib/resolvers/event_mutations/removeEvent.js)
